Pri_Pcypara1: This Privacy Policy (the “Policy”) is applicable to the Personal Information (as defined below) and data collected by Precision Sample, LLC and its site
Pri_Pcypara2: , “we” or “us”). In this Policy we have provided details regarding the information we collect when you visit our website(s) (the “Site(s)”), how we may use, process, and share that information, your choices with regard to your information, and other related matters.
Pri_Pcypara4: Except as otherwise discussed in this Policy, this Policy only addresses the use and disclosure of Personal Information and data collected online by
Pri_Pcypara3: . For some services, we collect and transfer Personal Information to third parties and clients, or you may visit partners or service providers through links on our Site who may collect information from you. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites or entities before you disclose your information to them.
Pri_Pcypara5: We strive to be transparent in our data collection and processing practices and value your trust in our privacy practices. Please take the time to read this Policy, and if you have any questions, please contact us using the information below.
Whatwecollect: What information do we collect & how is it used?
Whatwecollectpara2: that relates to identified or identifiable individuals, including information that individuals or jurisdictions (such as the EU) may consider ‘sensitive personal information’  (this information is collectively referred to as “Personal Information”). “Aggregated Data” refers to data where we have taken reasonable steps to remove Personal Information such that individuals cannot be immediately identified from the data provided. We collect only the Personal Information and other data that we believe is necessary to provide our service and ensure valid survey results. The following describes the various ways in which we may collect data and Personal Information from you.
Whatwecollectpara4: Please note that some surveys accessible on our Site are hosted by third parties and are not provided by Precision Sample. This Policy does not apply to information you provide in a survey hosted by a third party. Wherever
Whatwecollectpara3: collects Personal Information, we make an effort to include a link to this Policy at the time the Personal Information is collected. Please be sure to read any other policies applicable to the collection of your information by third parties.
RegisMempara1: We collect Personal Information from users during registration.
RegisMempara2: requires a unique email address and private password. If you wish to participate in our surveys, we will also require that you enter your address, gender, date of birth, and ethnicity. We may also ask you to voluntarily provide us with your phone  number, information regarding your personal or professional interests, and certain demographic or other information.
RegisMempara3: The Personal Information you provide is primarily used to support your relationship with Precision Sample and our clients. In some circumstances, we may associate your Personal Information with additional information obtained from third party commercial sources so that we can provide our clients with Aggregated Data derived from information contained in your user profile and complimentary commercial sources.
RegisMempara4: If you consent during registration, we may also use Personal Information collected during registration to send you direct mailings, or contact you by telephone, SMS, or email about our various surveys and other opportunities we feel may be of interest to you. If you do not want to receive such communications or have your Personal Information shared with commercial sources, you may opt out by the means provided for in the email or mailings, or by following the procedure provided below.
onthesite1: If you use the “Contact Us” form on our Site we will collect your email address, name and other Personal Information you provide so that we may contact you in response to your inquiry.
onthesite2: servers also collect a log of IP addresses (the Internet address of a computer) to track users’ sessions and analyze traffic on our Site., and although we link your IP address to your Personal Information or other registration information during your registration and general use of our Site, if you participate in one of our client surveys, the IP address visible to our client will only be associated with an anonymous session ID rather than your name or other registration information (unless you voluntarily provide any Personal Information to our client during the course of the survey). If you do not wish to have your IP address collected or used in any manner, please do not register on our Site. If you have already registered and you wish to revoke your consent and have us delete your IP address, please contact us at the email address below (include “opt out” in the subject line) and you will no longer be permitted to take surveys as part of our panel.
Cookiespara1: Our website uses cookies as described in our
Cookiespara3: For unregistered members, our Site may install certain essential, functional, analytics and advertising cookies. These cookies facilitate and improve the functionality of our Site, deliver content that is relevant to users, and determine how users navigate to, from, and around our Site. These cookies may be either session or persistent cookies, and may be installed by us, or one of our third-party partners.If you are a registered user and opt-in to our web-browsing survey feature, we may install additional cookies that are used so that we, or our partners, may contact you regarding your opinion on certain things you see or do on the Internet. These tracking cookies contain Personal Information, including a unique user ID that islinked to your account. Further, these cookies track certain sites you may visit,the advertisements you see, and whether you click on certain content.We may use this and other Personal Information to contact you about your experience with such content or to direct you to a survey about your experiences.
Cookiespara4: If you are a registered user and opt-in to our web-browsing survey feature, we may install additional cookies that are used so that we, or our partners, may contact you regarding your opinion on certain things you see or do on the Internet. These tracking cookies contain Personal Information, including a unique user ID that is linked to your account. Further, these cookies track certain sites you may visit, the advertisements you see, and whether you click on certain content.
Cookiespara5: We may use this and other Personal Information to contact you about your experience with such content or to direct you to a survey about your experiences.
Surveyresponsepara4: when taking such surveys. We do not collect, have access to, or control over any Personal Information you provide when completing a survey unless hosted by
Surveyresponsepara5: . When you take a survey hosted by
Surveyresponsepara6: we may collect a wide array of Personal Information. The Personal Information requested by a survey varies depending on the purpose of the survey. Some survey questions may require users to provide sensitive Personal Information.
Surveyresponsepara7: Users may elect not to respond to surveys that request Personal Information. If you do not wish to provide Personal Information, simply do not submit the survey or answer any questions that request Personal Information. Individual responses may be submitted and saved even if you do not complete the survey. Your submission of this information manifests your ‘opt-in’ consent to the transmission and processing of this information in accordance with the terms of this Policy.
Surveyresponsepara8: When we host a survey and receive the responses, we will use your Personal Information to create a report comprised of Aggregated Data that we will provide to our clients,and we may otherwise use responses in accordance with standard market research industry practices and guidelines. We do not sell or use Personal Information collected during surveys for direct marketing or other advertising purposes. Please remember that some surveys may be hosted by our clients or other third parties, in which case this Policy does not apply. Please be sure to read all policies provided by third parties who may host a survey.
AdvertisingPartnerspara2: Site and are asked for Personal Information, you are providing that information to
AdvertisingPartnerspara3: , and your Personal Information will be used in accordance with this Policy. Please also be aware that
AdvertisingPartnerspara4: ’s advertising partners may have links on our Site that will cause you to leave our Site and connect you to third party sites that may also collect Personal Information from you. The information practices of websites linked to by
AdvertisingPartnerspara5: .com, either through advertisements or other hyperlinks, are not covered by this Policy.
Withwhomweshare: With whom do you share my information?
Withwhomwesharepara1: Personal Information we collect may be disclosed to a variety of parties, depending upon the purpose for which the information was provided and the context in which it was provided. The following describes how we may share the Personal Information we receive through our Site.
RegInfopara1: If you register with our Site, your Personal Information will be aggregated and maintained as part of your profile. Unless we have your permission or are required by law, we may share Personal Information collected during registration with our agents, contractors or our business partners who perform essential services on our behalf. We may share Aggregated Data with other third parties, such as a client who requested that we host a survey. In some circumstances, we may share Personal Information with commercial data suppliers so that we can obtain additional information relevant to a survey, to better validate your survey responses, so that we may share additional Aggregated Data with our clients, or for other business purposes.
RegInfopara7: We may contact you via email, postal mail, telephone or SMS. However, all emails you receive from
RegInfopara2: and our partners will come from
RegInfopara3: or Precision Sample, so you can easily distinguish all emails that come from us. Opting out of any email from
RegInfopara4: or one of our partners will stop all emails being sent by
RegInfopara6: and our partners will promptly honor opt-out requests.
profileques1: We may ask users to complete a profiling questionnaire before those users are able to take certain surveys. These profiling questionnaires are necessary to ensure we can provide our clients with survey participants meeting the criteria identified by our clients. The content of the questionnaire varies depending on the nature of the survey and questions we ask. Some profiling questions may require users to provide sensitive Personal Information if the user chooses to complete the questionnaire.We may occasionally share certain answers to the profiling questionnaires with our clients on an anonymous basis, to enrich survey results or for other common research industry practices.
profileques2: Users may choose not to respond to questions in a profiling questionnaire that request Personal Information. If you do not wish to provide Personal Information, do not submit the questionnaire or answer any questions that request Personal Information.Individual responses may be submitted and saved even if you do not complete the questionnaire. Your submission of any Personal Information manifests your ‘opt-in’ consent to the transmission and processing of this information in accordance with the terms of this and any other applicable policies.
profileques3: Personal Information requested in a profiling questionnaire is collected for the purpose of validating survey responses and ensuring survey panels are comprised of users who fit specific criteria. Personal Information collected through the profiling questionnaire may be retained as part of a user’s profile.
Profilequespara1: Any Personal Information you provide in a profiling questionnaire may be shared with clients for the purpose of survey validation. We may also share your responses with agents, contractors or our business partners for the purpose of performing essential services on our behalf. Your questionnaire responses are linked to your survey using a randomly generated ID number, and we do not share your name when we share your responses to a profiling questionnaire.
Surveyinfopara: Many of the surveys linked to by
Surveyinfopara1: are hosted by third parties who are not bound by this Policy. In the event you take a survey hosted by
Surveyinfopara2: we will take reasonable efforts to make this Policy available on the Site. When you take a survey hosted by
Surveyinfopara3: , we will share your responses to that survey, including any Personal Information provided therein, with the client who requested the survey. However, we do not share users’ names with our clients. Instead, we share a randomly-generated identifier that is associated with the profiling questionnaire and survey responses themselves.Please remember that this policy does not apply to surveys hosted by third parties,so please read the applicable policies of any third-party sites you may visit.
Cookiepara1: If you are a registered user who has consented to the installation of our web-browsing based survey opportunity, we may share a randomly generated user ID and the information contained in or collected from the use of the tracking cookie with certain client and survey partners. If a client would like to contact you about completing a survey,we will contact you so you may complete the survey if you wish to do so.
Extradis1: We may share any of your Personal Information that we possess as part of a merger, sale or transfer of our business or substantially all of our assets, or other business transition. We may also share your Personal Information in order to bring legal action against someone who may be violating
Extradispara1: ’s Terms of Use or if we need to protect our interests, our customers, property or the public. We may share any of your Personal Information that we possess with governmental authorities or others in response to a legal request that we believe requires us to do so. We will share such information to the extent we believe that request requires. Legal requests include, for example, search warrants, subpoenas,and other court orders. We may also receive legal requests or orders from jurisdictions outside the United States who assert jurisdiction over your Personal Information,in which case your Personal Information may be transferred to the requesting country.
Withdraw: How can I withdraw my consent to data collection and sharing?
Withdraw1: When you submit any Personal Information requested by a survey, questionnaire, or when registering on this Site, you opt in to the collection, sharing, and transmission of your Personal Information to the United States in accordance with the terms of this Policy. You may opt out of our data collection and future sharing of this Personal Information by sending to the address or email below a notice withdrawing your consent to our sharing and use of your Personal Information. Furthermore, when we contact you, whether via email, phone or mail, you will have the opportunity to opt-out of receiving such information in the future.
Personalinfo: How is my Personal Information protected?
Personalinfo1: We use reasonable security measures to protect all Personal Information collected during registration and submitted through surveys on our Site. We implement and regularly review various physical, procedural and technological safeguards that we believe will keep your Personal Information secure.
Retainpersonalinfo: How long do you retain my Personal Information
Retainpersonalinfo1: We store Personal Information provided during registration, questionnaires, and surveys for so long as we deem necessary based on the purpose for which it was collected.Such information may be retained after you close your account so that you are able to reactivate your account. Please remember that we do not have control over the data retention practices of our clients and any Personal Information provided in a survey may be retained for so long as required by the client.
Updatedelete: How do I access, update or delete my information?
Updatedelete1: You can request the specific Personal Information that
Updatedeletepara1: has collected about you ,to correct factual inaccuracies in your information, close your registration with our Site, remove Personal Information from
Updatedeletepara2: ’s databases, and/or update your Personal Information by contacting
Updatedeletepara3: .com. Unless you request otherwise, if you have asked us to close your account, we typically retain the minimum amount of data required to deduplicate your record in the event we happen to receive any additional Personal Information about you in the future. In addition, in accordance with California law, residents of California may obtain a list of third parties to whom we have disclosed your Personal Information for direct marketing purposes (if any) during the preceding calendar year, and the type of information disclosed to such parties, by mailing a written, signed request to the postal address below.
Cokkiestrackingpara1: As noted above and in our
Cokkiestrackingpara3: , our Site may use cookies, web beacons and similar tracking technologies. These technologies are widely used for security, to learn about and improve upon how users navigate a website, to enable certain features, or to deliver relevant advertising content to you on the web. To learn more about cookies and similar tracking technologies, and how they can affect your privacy, visit allaboutcookies.org.
Cokkiestrackingpara8: Please note, most modern browsers include a “do not track” feature that may help protect your privacy. However, because there is not yet a defined response to do-not-track requests, our Site does not respond to your browser’s do-not-track request.
Cokkiestrackingpara9: If you wish to take steps to opt-out of tracking by certain online advertisers, you can visit the Digital Advertising Alliance’s opt-out page at
Cokkiestrackingpara4: To learn more about, or to opt-out of Google’s analytic and marketing services, visit
Internationaluserspara2: from outside of the United States, any Personal Information provided will be transferred to us or our service providers in the United States. Regardless of where your Personal Information is collected or transferred, the information will be treated in accordance with this Privacy Policy. You consent to such transfer through your continued use of
Harborpara1: We comply with the US-EU Safe Harbor Framework (“Safe Harbor”), which relates to the collection, use and retention of Personal Information collected from users in the European Union. We adhere to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles of notice, choice, onward transfer, security, data integrity, access and enforcement. To learn more about the Safe Harbor program and the Safe Harbor Principles, please visit
Harborpara2: Any questions or concerns about our privacy practices should be sent to the address or email below. We will investigate and attempt to resolve any complaints and disputes regarding the use and disclosure of Personal Information in accordance with the provisions of this Policy.
Harborpara4: If any complaints cannot be resolved between you and
Harborpara3: , we have agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of JAMS to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles. EU residents with unresolved complaints may refer them to the JAMS as described at
Agereqpara2: This Site is neither directed at nor intended for use by children under the age of 13. Further, we do not knowingly collect Personal Information from children under the age of 13. If we learn that we have inadvertently done so, we will promptly delete it and we will remove the child from any mailing lists, registrations, or other means of contacting the child. Do not access or use
Agereqpara1: unless you are at least 13 years old or older.
Limitationspara1: By providing us with any Personal Information you expressly and unconditionally  release and hold harmless
Limitationspara: , Precision Sample, its parents, subsidiaries, affiliates, related companies and their respective shareholders, owners, members, directors, officers, employees and agents (collectively, the “Releasees”) from any and all liability for any injuries, loss or damage of any kind arising from or in connection with the use and/or misuse of your collected Personal Information. In addition, we are not liable for any injuries, loss or damage of any kind arising from or in connection with the use and/or misuse of your collected Personal Information by third parties.
Changestopolicy1: This Policy may change from time to time. We post our current Policy and its effective date on our website. If we believe we need your express consent following any changes, then we will notify you. Your continued use of our Site after we make any changes manifests your consent to the modified version of this Policy.
